settings.heading: Sizing
settings.text_content: When shopping for your first cock ring, simpler is always better. Look for a cock ring made from super stretchy TPR/TPE or Silicone or for an adjustable style. Cock rings with a lot of stretch can fit most penis sizes, so don't be fooled by their size (if you have a larger penis, you should look for a stretchy ring with a larger diameter). If you opt for an adjustable style, be sure to sufficiently tighten your cock ring enough. If a cock ring is loose, it won't work for its intended purpose.
